actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the full amount of any annuity received under the Civil Service Retirement Act shall be excluded from gross income.

summary.text: Provides that the full amount of any annuity received under the Civil Service Retirement Act shall be excluded from gross income under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 121)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the full amount of any annuity received under the Civil Service Retirement Act shall be excluded from gross income.
